reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress to be of good quality, with one mentioning its eyelet sleeves, and appreciate its feminine style that looks expensive. The dress fits well, with one customer noting it hits at mid-calf, and customers find it comfortable and flattering with a nice cut. They like the color options, with one highlighting its perfect green tone for fall, and find it versatile enough to be dressed up or worn casually. The fabric quality receives mixed feedback, with some praising its high-quality feel while others note it's not as flowy as expected. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely dress
items.body: Wore the black one and it was beautiful. Very good for a large busted woman who wants to hide a bit of a tummy ! Material is just okay. Read more
items.author: jayme chenoweth

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, Flattering, and Great Value
items.body: Purchased the ZESICA maxi dress in XLâ€”great comfort, fit, and easy care for an everyday or casual party look. Pros: Soft, lightweight cotton material Comfortable and breathable for all-day wear Wrinkle-resistant and easy to iron Roomy fit that shrinks slightly after washing (true to cotton) Flattering shape with good color options Excellent value for the price Washabilty is good. Cons: Runs a bit roomy before first wash (expect slight shrinkage). Summary For reference, Iâ€™m 5â€™0â€, 170 lbs with 42â€ bust, 36â€ waist, and 42â€ hipsâ€”the XL fit roomy at first, then shrank slightly in the wash for a better fit. Overall, a comfortable, easy-care dress that feels worth more than its price. Read more
items.author: Gigi

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful (!) but holes get caught and ripped on everything!
items.body: Wonderful, beautiful and unique dress, however the outer layer design with the holes gets caught on everything!! I just bought this and already have several noticeable tears in the fabric from the dress catching on things. I absolutely love the color, fit, and flow however and would still recommend this product to wear with a lot of caution so it doesn't get caught and ripped. Read more
items.author: Veronica

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress!
items.body: Iâ€™m 5â€™4 and 140, I ordered medium and itâ€™s above my ankle. Ordered navy for a wedding in DC mid October. This dress is absolutely lovely. Washed it gently and partially dried it and hung to finish drying. Neckline may need a stream or touch with the iron. This dress is special. Can be dressed up or worn casually. Tiered skirt has pockets-yay and is beautifully lined with only 6â€ of the hem and the sleeves open eyelet. Very feminine. Waistline is double row of elastic separated by a few inches, so quite flattering. Iâ€™ve made a lot of garments and this one feels substantive and quality-yet the fabric looks like cotton but is care free, pleasing fabric. The eyelet doesnâ€™t seem like an October choice, but this dress truly is perfectly transitional. Read more
items.author: annp77

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Favorite Long-Sleeve Dress
items.body: I feel pretty, very pretty when I wear this dress. I am 5'6" about 199 pounds and I ordered a 2X. It fits me perfect and I get loads of compliments on this dress. It has a beautiful lining (but I still wear a full slip anyways). It is very long, about mid-calf and I can wear knee-high socks with it and no one sees the tops. The sleeves have these very cool eyelets on them. This dress is my favorite. Makes me smile to have such a beautiful dress. Read more
items.author: Cinnamon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: This is a beautiful dress. iâ€™m thankful to have been able to add it to my collection of dresses since I prefer to wear them as often as I can. Seems well made and great fit. Read more
items.author: kaylove

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Caution: Eyelets Prone to Snagging & Ripping
items.body: This dress looks beautiful and fits extremely well, HOWEVER! It is cheaply made. The eyelet material gets snagged on EVERYTHING and causes the dress to have large rips, making the dress unwearable. I thought maybe this was a fluke so I ordered a replacement dress. NOPE. Same thing happened - the replacement dress ripped too! I returned the second dress for a refund. Such a shame because itâ€™s truly a pretty and flattering dress! But I just canâ€™t walk around on eggshells trying to not snag this dress on something. Read more
items.author: Ram Rod

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not The Right Color
items.body: It fit right. Itâ€™s a nice dress. The problem is the color. I chose watermelon. Itâ€™s more of an orange color. Disappointed! Read more
items.author: Debby G.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Maxi Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky, Brown, Rust, Watermelon, Fuchsia, Apricot, Black, Dustyblue, Lightpurple, Olive, Red, Navy, Pink, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
